page.title: 11 WILLIAM LEECH-BUILDER
page.content: {William Leech}was born in{Newcastle- {Upon-Tyne}and was educated at Westgate Road Council School.At 21, his ambition was to own a Rolls Royce, a country estate and a charitable trust.His first occupation was engineering but he changed to building instead because of his theory that other builders used inefficient methods. He came to Morpeth in 1934, building on over 300 acres of land here and 7000 acres throughout Britain.He built houses for 44 years and retired in 1976 to become President of{Leech {Homes.} Over the years, houses have altered in design.Mr. Leech's houses had outside W.C.'s and coalhouses !Mr. Leech predicts that solar heating, leisure and exercise rooms will transform future homes.
